message: just remove the {% endthumbnail %} and it should work. {% thumbnail %} is not a block tag.
could any of you do some test and tell me the result?

anyone here using sorl thumbnail? it's amazing from what i saw so far, but i can't put a {% thumbnail %} block inside a {% for %}. the docs -- http://thumbnail.sorl.net/template.html -- shows that it's possible, so i can't understand what's going on. (django 1.2.5, thumbnail 11.01)
am getting "TemplateSyntaxError: Invalid block tag: 'thumbnail', expected 'empty' ou 'endfor'" with the following code: http://dpaste.com/527026/
oh. looks like it IS a block tag in sorl.thumbnail but not in easy_thumbnails.
you did include {% load thumbnail %} in your template, right?
no i didn't. what a shame. :P
it worked flawlessly after loading thumbnail. the exception bubbling should've told me that the thumbnail block tag didn't exist. i could take hours to notice that i missed it. thanks. :)
